sentences.sContent: When you make coleslaw or potato salad, use light or non-fat mayonnaise.
sentences.sContent_eng: When you make coleslaw or potato salad, use light or non-fat mayonnaise.
sentences.sCn: 当你做凉拌卷心菜或者土豆沙拉，用低或者无脂的蛋黄酱。

sentences.sContent: Urban Pantry also sells biscotti, zucchini pickles, coleslaw and garlic-marinated sweet red peppers.
sentences.sContent_eng: Urban Pantry also sells biscotti, zucchini pickles, coleslaw and garlic-marinated sweet red peppers.
sentences.sCn: 此外还出售意大利脆饼、西葫芦腌菜、凉拌卷心菜丝和蒜香甜红椒。

trans.tranOther: a  salad  made with thinly cut raw  cabbage
